          <title>
            <string language="en">N-Z plot</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">N-Z Plot</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Traçage de N-Z</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lote de N-Z</string>

            <string language="x-mt-es">Diagrama de N-Z</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The graph shows the corresponding number of protons and neutrons of stable isotopes and their decay mechanisms.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>

          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Diagramm zeigt die entsprechende Zahl 
Protonen und Neutronen der beständigen Isotope und ihrer 
Zerfalleinheiten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le graphique montre le nombre correspondant de 
protons et de neutrons des isotopes stables et de leurs mécanismes 
d'affaiblissement.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O gráfico mostra o número correspondente dos 
protons e dos nêutrons de isotopes estáveis e de seus mecanismos da 
deterioração.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il grafico mostra il numero corrispondente di 
protoni e di neutroni degli isotopi stabili e dei loro meccanismi di 
deperimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η γραφική παράσταση εμφανίζει αντίστοιχο αριθμό 
πρωτονίων και νετρονίων των σταθερών ισοτόπων και των μηχανισμών 
αποσύνθεσής τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El gráfico muestra el número correspondiente de 
protones y de neutrones de isótopos estables y de sus mecanismos del 
decaimiento.</string>
          </description>
